Swiss Tournament

This project uses Python and a simple PostgreSQL database to generate Swiss Style tournament player pairings. It was built according to spec provided in the Intro to Programming Nanodegree program from Udacity.

Movie Trailer Website

This project uses Python to generate a simple website for displaying and playing movie trailers. It was built according to the spec provided in the Intro to Programming Nanodegree from Udacity.

Fill in the Blank Quiz

This project utilizes Python to display and check a fill in the blank quiz.
